product_name: Pearl Izumi All-Road II Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Pearl Izumi All-Road II bike shoes provide all the high-level performance you need at an affordable price. Synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers are breathable and durable; low-cut ankle support reduces overall weight. 3 rip-and-stick closure straps are angled to follow a more anatomic curve, ensuring an evenly tensioned fit and the elimination of hot spots. Nylon and composite fiber shank/plate ensures excellent power transfer. Insoles provide excellent arch support and cushion. Low profile, concave shaping of footbed/plate cradles the foot for support, comfort and pedaling efficiency. Low profile outsoles can be worn indoors and out. Cleats for The Pearl Izumi All-Road II bike shoes are sold separately.
short_description: The Pearl Izumi All-Road II bike shoes provide all the high-level performance you need at an affordable price.
